alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North Itasca; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Itasca and west central St. Louis Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 445 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Keewatin, or 10 miles northwest of Hibbing, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hibbing, Chisholm, Mountain Iron, Keewatin, Buhl, Nashwauk, Cherry, Kinney, Leetonia, Little Swan, Kelly Lake, West Two Rivers Reservoir, and Stingy Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; North Itasca; South Itasca
